name: Falconer
description: A trainer of hunting birds and falcons; adventurers can purchase trained birds, learn falconry skills, or commission hunting expeditions.
atmosphere: The mews is filled with the sharp calls of hunting birds and the earthy scent of leather and feathers. The air carries the promise of the hunt and the bond between falconer and bird, while the atmosphere is one of ancient tradition and the art of falconry.
